text: Ilja Seifert (6 May 1951 â€“ 10 September 2022) was a German politician. He was a member of the Party of Democratic Socialism and later The Left. He was in the Volkskammer from March to October 1990 and in the Bundestag from 1990 to 1994, 1998 to 2002, and again from 2005 to 2013. Seifert died on 10 September 2022 at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Berlin Category:Politicians of The Left Party.PDS Category:Politicians of the Left Party
title: Ilja Seifert
